quote.issuer_name: China Industrial Securities Int'l Financial Group Ltd.
quote.nm: China Industrial Securities Int'l Financial Group Ltd.
quote.summary: China Industrial Securities International Financial Group Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the provision of brokerage services. The Company operates its business through five segments. The Brokerage segment is engaged in the provision of securities, futures, options and insurance brokerage services. The Loans and Financing segment is engaged in the provision of margin financing and secured or unsecured loans to customers. The Corporate Finance segment is engaged in the provision of corporate advisory, sponsor, placing and underwriting services of debt and equity securities and structured products arrangement services. The Asset Management segment is engaged in the provision of fund management, discretionary account management and investment advisory services. The Financial Products and Investments segment is engaged in the proprietary trading and investment of funds, debt and equity securities, fixed income, derivatives and other financial products.
quote.office_address:
32/F, Infinitus Plaza
